Uniform Transfer On Death Security Registration Act

law.catch_line: Words Showing Registration Of Security In Beneficiary Form
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 24. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] Registration in beneficiary form may be shown by the words "transfer on death'' or the abbreviation "TOD'', or by the words "pay on death'' or the abbreviation "POD'', after the name of the registered owner and before the name of a beneficiary.
